title: Ludicrous & Not Legal (with Feryal Clark MP)
itunes:title: Ludicrous & Not Legal (with Feryal Clark MP)
description:
Plans to send asylum seekers to Rwanda for processing are 'ludicrous' and 'not legal', says Labour's Feryal Clark. The MP for Enfield North tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts the U.K. needs a more humane immigration policy.

Plus: three weeks ahead of the local elections, we get the latest polling with Gideon Skinner, Head of Political Research at Ipsos.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Plus: three weeks ahead of the local elections, we get the latest polling with Gideon Skinner, Head of Political Research at Ipsos.
